blogPost.excerpt: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.
blogPost.body: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.
blogPost.title: Kameleont - Create dynamic links that redirects based on device or OS
blogPost.author: Jonathan Andersson

localize.description: 他们是完美的被用于在电子邮件中重定向iOS用户到应用商店，安卓用户到Play商店和那些使用电脑，你可以重定向他们到你的Web应用程序。而那些我们无法匹配的用户，他们将被发送到做你的默认网址。
localize.tagline: 创建动态链接，根据设备或操作系统重定向。

localize.description: 他們是完美的被用於在電子郵件中重定向iOS用戶到應用商店，安卓用戶到Play商店和那些使用電腦，你可以重定向他們到你的Web應用程序。而那些我們無法匹配的用戶，他們將被髮送到做你的默認網址。
localize.tagline: 創建動態鏈接，根據設備或操作系統重定向。

previous.excerpt: Filter bubbles impair our ability to communicate with others and threaten our sense of reality. However, many people don't know they are in one! Blindspotter analyzes your news interactions on Twitter and lets you know if you have a blindspot, left or right.
previous.title: Blindspotter - Visualize your news blindspots

localize.description: 过滤器气泡损害了我们与他人沟通的能力，威胁到我们的现实感。然而，许多人不知道他们是在一个! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新闻互动，让你知道你是否有盲点，左或右。
localize.tagline: 将您的新闻盲点可视化

localize.description: 過濾器氣泡損害了我們與他人溝通的能力，威脅到我們的現實感。然而，許多人不知道他們是在一個! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新聞互動，讓你知道你是否有盲點，左或右。
localize.tagline: 將您的新聞盲點可視化
